game.title: The Lost Key
game.objective: Retrieve the lost key from the goblin cave.
game.description: A goblin stole the key to the village gate. Find the cave, defeat the goblin, and retrieve the key.

task.description: Travel north along the river until you reach the Dark Forest. The cave is hidden deep within the forest.
The goblin is a powerful foe, so come prepared. Use caution and watch out for its attacks.
Once you have defeated the goblin, search its body for the key.

task.objective: Return the key to the mayor.
task.description: Once you have the key, return to the village gate and speak to the mayor.
